id.description: The unique identifier (UUID) of this object

type.description: The type of this object - always `moves`

reference.description: Unique human-readable identifier for the Move

status.description: Indicates the stage in it's lifecycle that this move is at

move_type.description: Indicates the type of move, e.g. prison transfer or court appearance

time_due.description: Time due at the destination, e.g. court appointment time

updated_at.description: Timestamp of when the move was last created or updated

date.description: Date on which the move is scheduled

additional_information.description: Additional information about the move that the supplier should be made aware of

cancellation_reason.description: Reason the move has been cancelled

cancellation_reason_comment.description: In case 'other' is chosen as cancellation_reason, further details can be specified

from_location.description: The location that the person is being moved from

to_location.description: The location that the person is being moved to
